version_description:
- New Weekly Events!
- New Weekly Ranking!
- Fixed Package Claim for certain devices.
- Joystick improvements.

- New Weekly Events!
- New Weekly Ranking!
- Fixed Package Claim for certain devices.
- Joystick improvements.

- New Weekly Events!
- New Weekly Ranking!
- Fixed Package Claim for certain devices.
- Adjusted difficulty for mini games (missions).
- New anchored joystick (Revert to the old one by tapping "hide" on settings)

Thank you so much for your feedback! Remember to reach us at 1sland@nada.studio, @wearenada, or r/1sland with your ideas :)

- New Weekly Ranking!
- Fixed Package Claim for certain devices.
- Adjusted difficulty for mini games (missions).
- New anchored joystick (Revert to the old one by tapping "hide" on settings)

- New Weekly Events!
- New Weekly Ranking!
- Fixed Package Claim for certain devices.
- Adjusted difficulty for mini games (missions).
- New anchored joystick (Revert to the old one by tapping "hide" on settings)

Thank you so much for your feedback! Remember to reach us at 1sland@nada.studio, @wearenada, or r/1sland with your ideas :)

- We have redesigned the boat menu!
- New Boat Complements are here, starting with Kites!
- New Onboarding (just for new users).
- Bug fixes and security improvements.

Thank you so much for your feedback! Keep it coming to 1sland@nada.studio, @wearenada, and r/1sland :-)

- We have redesigned the boat menu!
- New Boat Complements are here, starting with Kites!
- New Onboarding (just for new users).
- Bug fixes and security improvements.

Thank you so much for your feedback! Keep it coming to 1sland@nada.studio, @wearenada, and r/1sland :-)

New Season: Fall is here!

- New Widget to track progress (iOS14 only)
- Sail with friends (co-op)
- New Minigames
- New Skins
- New Kites
- Much more!

New Season: Fall is here!

- New Widget to track progress (iOS14 only)
- Sail with friends (co-op)
- New Minigames
- New Skins
- New Kites
- Much more!

New Season: Winter!

- LIVE ROUNDS! A new Multiplayer mode where you can play fast-paced rounds against other sailors, anytime!
- 13 New Special Boats for weekly events.
- New winter island.
- New Boat Skins and Complements.
- Much more!

Thank you so much for playing 1sland!
Please, feel free to reach us at 1sland@nada.studio with your feedback and comments :)
